synopsis.text: Ikuya, Haru, and Makoto find themselves reunited with their former middle school teammates as they embark on their college journey in this reconstructed version of the Free! Dive to the Future anime series. Old wounds resurface as Ikuya, still bitter about their team's sudden disbandment, seeks to prove his superiority over Haru. Amidst these personal conflicts, the waters of competition grow even more turbulent with new challenges arising. This film presents a fresh perspective on the series, complete with an exciting new episode.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
